Today reviewed the results of the 2016 Arab Youth Survey conducted by international companies Esda Burson-Marsteller and Ben Schoen-Berland,
In the poll, which included 16 Arab countries, the UAE ranked fifth on the list of Arab countries' favorite countries for living and living
The UAE also ranked first as a successful development model for young Arabs followed by the United States, Germany and France
The UAE also ranked first in the eyes of Arab youth as a preferred country to launch their businesses, and we tell them UAE your country and the country of good to all

Received a briefing today on the Arab Youth Survey conducted by international companies Asda'a Burson-Marsteller and Penn Schoen Berland.
For the fifth year in succession, in this survey of youth in 16 Arab countries, the UAE ranked first as a location to live and work.
The UAE was also ranked first by Arab youth as a model for successful development, followed by the US, Germany and France.
The UAE was also ranked by Arab youth as their preferred regional startup location. Our message to them is: You are most welcomed.
The IMF is right - leaving the EU would pose major risks for the UK economy. We are stronger, safer and better off in the European Union.
#EC Proposal - Multinational in Europe shouldnt make public information on the WHERE They make Their profits & WHERE They Pay Their #tax #FAIRtax
Country by country reporting Affect abt 6500 businesses in #Europe with a turnover of + than EUR 750 mn; exempt SMEs & business secrets #tax
Companies are also required to report on the total tax They pay outside the EU, incl. #tax paid tax in problematic Jurisdiction #FAIRtax
Measures #TaxTransparency fit into a Broader agenda to fight #tax #evasion & ensure #fairtax for SMEs & Citizens. W / @JHillEU @pierremoscovici

There are 27 heroes of democracy, from 12 different parties, who had the courage to turn against the report, the instrument of a fraud.
There were 41.5% of the commission votes. We needed 33%. In the plenary we will try to do even more. Humility and confidence that we go forward.
They gave the parliamentary example of PT, PP, PMDB, PSD, PR, PDT, PCdoB, PSOL, Network, PTdoB, PTN and PEN.
All stood in favor of legality and against a fragile report.
My thanks for solidarity.
By the firmness of attitude in rejecting the removal of a president who has not committed a crime of responsibility.
They honored democracy and the Constitution.

Addressing the #EPlenary on last European Council. Follow it live here: https://t.co/cMkfPYOYEI. #EUCO
In January EU had no more than 2 months to save Schengen. We have used the last two months as best we could
Important #EUCO decisions to end the wave-through policy, massive humanitarian support to Greece & return of irregular migrants to Turkey
No ideal 100% effective solution exists to migration crisis. We are faced with perpetual, tenuous & multi-dimensional effort
Solving the root causes of migration cannot be ignored but too often sounded like an alibi for doing nothing in Europe
We must be prepared to show solidarity to Italy and Malta. Alarming numbers of would-be migrants from Libya via Central Mediterranen route
EU divided on migration far too long. Finally building synthesis of two great needs: security at our borders & openness/tolerance
